title: Imran232
author: Imran232
content: If you were affected by the attack on certain Solana wallets, please fill out the form https://solanafoundation.typeform.com/to/Rxm8STITInformation:The asset stolen in Solana's smart wallet, try filling out the form (https://solanafoundation.typeform.com/to/Rxm8STIT) Enter the address of the wallet from which the asset was stolenDirect info from notice https://solscan.io/account/Htp9MGP8Tig923ZFY7Qf2zzbMUmYneFRAhSp7vSg4wxVHopefully there will be good things after filling out the form for those of you who are victims of the hack  Click hereEngineers from multiple ecosystems, with the help of several security firms, are investigating drained wallets on Solana. There is no evidence hardware wallets are impacted. Do not reuse your seed phrase on a hardware wallet - create a new seed phrase. If your wallet was one of the 7,767 impacted please complete this survey – engineers are investigating the root causeThis thread will be updated as new information becomes available.https://twitter.com/solanastatus/status/1554658171934937090
